smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function navigateToIndex appears to be too complex.
The function onCreateView appears to be too complex.

smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function onCreate is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function onAttach is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'HostSonicRuntime' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'TransactionController' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: ThrowingExceptionsWithoutMessageOrCause
smells.description: A call to the default constructor of an exception was detected. Instead one of the constructor overloads should be called. This allows to provide more meaningful exceptions.

smells.name: VariableNaming
smells.description: Variable names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private variable names should match the pattern: (_)?[a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private variable names should match the pattern: (_)?[a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: ConstructorParameterNaming
smells.description: Constructor parameter names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

smells.name: MatchingDeclarationName
smells.description: If a source file contains only a single non-private top-level class or object, the file name should reflect the case-sensitive name plus the .kt extension.

instances.message: The file name 'OthersController.kt' does not match the name of the single top-level declaration 'OthersSampleController'.
The file name 'ViewBuilder.kt' does not match the name of the single top-level declaration 'ContextProvider'.
The file name 'CoroutinePriority.kt' does not match the name of the single top-level declaration 'WorkerThreadFactory'.

smells.name: ObjectPropertyNaming
smells.description: Property names inside objects should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: SpreadOperator
smells.description: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

instances.message: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

smells.name: ForEachOnRange
smells.description: Using the forEach method on ranges has a heavy performance cost. Prefer using simple for loops.

instances.message: Using the forEach method on ranges has a heavy performance cost. Prefer using simple for loops.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: android.graphics.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.graphics.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
java.io.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

android.widget.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.transition.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (measuredWidth + Math.abs(START_OFFSET)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: measuredWidth + Math.abs(START_OFFSET)
Parentheses in (measuredWidth + Math.abs(START_OFFSET)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: measuredWidth + Math.abs(START_OFFSET)
Parentheses in (it.findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.img)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: it.findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.img)
Parentheses in (it.findViewById<TextView>(R.id.txt)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: it.findViewById<TextView>(R.id.txt)

instances.message: Private property pendant is unused.

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class Test defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class NavigateItem defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.

smells.name: MayBeConst
smells.description: Reports vals that can be const val instead.

instances.message: VIEW_ID can be a `const val`.

smells.name: SerialVersionUIDInSerializableClass
smells.description: A class which implements the Serializable interface does not define a correct serialVersionUID field. The serialVersionUID field should be a constant long value inside a companion object.

instances.message: The class ControllerMaker implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
The class ConductorSample implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.

smells.name: UtilityClassWithPublicConstructor
smells.description: The class declaration is unnecessary because it only contains utility functions. An object declaration should be used instead.

instances.message: The class LongInitLibrary only contains utility functions. Consider defining it as an object.
